name: The Milky Way (CptPlebby)
description:
The Milky Way is a 8 Level short Puzzle-Game in which you have to find the right way for milkbottles to the cheese-machine.  Set belts in the right way and clear it with items to avoid broken bottles. 

This is the first Game I made and completed with GMS2. Have Fun and give me some feedback for getting better :)
